main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted in Groveton, Missouri on February 9, 1968, for 5-10 minutes.
interesting points: The object emitted a loud noise akin to jet aircraft, and it moved at high speed before disappearing from view., Witnesses reported that the object displayed a pulsating light., The sighting occurred around 7:30 p.m. on January 28, 1968, prior to the later investigation., Local authorities were informed, but they couldn't explain the phenomena., The sighting was documented in a letter from the Air Force requesting further information.
sighted object: extremely bright light in the sky
witnesses: Mr. and Mrs. Donald L. White
